student.orhan.onur.project2

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • student.orhan.onur.project2.Piece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    drawing_framework.Animatable

    public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
implements drawing_framework.Animatable
    Class that handles operations with the Tetris pieces
    Author:
    Onur Orhan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Piece(Unit center, Unit ni, Unit san, Unit yon, java.awt.Color color, Tetris tetris, boolean isAI, int type)
      Piece constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(drawing_framework.AnimationCanvas canvas)
      Paints the units of the piece; writes the points earned, which mode the game is at, and if the game is over.
      boolean gameEnd()
      Checks if the game has reached an end
      int getOrientation()
      Gets the orientation of the piece
      int getType()
      Gets the type of the piece
      boolean isOverlapping()
      Returns true if the piece is overlapping with a previous one
      boolean isWithin()
      Method that decides if the piece is within the canvas
      int minComplete()
      Returns the level of the lowest complete row
      void move(drawing_framework.AnimationCanvas canvas)
      Method that moves the piece downwards, replaces the current piece with the next one, decides at which stage the game is at and finally calls the AI.
      boolean nextTo(boolean right)
      Returns true if there is a barrier next to the piece on the declared side
      boolean onFloor()
      Returns true if the piece is on the base level ( y = 0 )
      boolean onTop()
      Returns true if the piece is on top of another one
      void rotate()
      Rotates the piece 90 degrees counterclockwise.
      void rowOps()
      When a piece falls to the ground, this method checks if there is a complete row.
      void setOrientation(int orientation)
      Sets the orientation of the piece
      void setType(int type)
      Sets the type of the piece
      void shift(boolean right)
      Shifts the piece to the declared side ( true shifts right, false shifts left )
      int sideBorderCross()
      Returns how far is the piece away from the borders ( Returns 0 if inside the borders )
      void speedUp()
      Shifts the piece one unit down for acceleration
      void toGarbage()
      When a piece falls to the ground, this method saves the units as garbage and adds them to their corresponding rows.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece(Unit center,
             Unit ni,
             Unit san,
             Unit yon,
             java.awt.Color color,
             Tetris tetris,
             boolean isAI,
             int type)
        Piece constructor
        Parameters:
        center - Center unit of the piece
        ni - Second unit of the piece
        san - Third unit of the piece
        yon - Fourth unit of the piece
        color - Color of the piece
        tetris - The current Tetris game
        isAI - If the AI is going to handle the piece or not
        type - Type of the piece

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(drawing_framework.AnimationCanvas canvas)
        Method that moves the piece downwards, replaces the current piece with the next one, decides at which stage the game is at and finally calls the AI.
        Specified by:
        move in interface drawing_framework.Animatable

      • rowOps

        public void rowOps()
        When a piece falls to the ground, this method checks if there is a complete row. If there is, removes the complete rows and shifts the others down when necessary.

      • minComplete

        public int minComplete()
        Returns the level of the lowest complete row
        Returns:
        Level of the lowest complete row (20 if there is no complete row)

      • draw

        public void draw(drawing_framework.AnimationCanvas canvas)
        Paints the units of the piece; writes the points earned, which mode the game is at, and if the game is over.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface drawing_framework.Animatable

      • toGarbage

        public void toGarbage()
        When a piece falls to the ground, this method saves the units as garbage and adds them to their corresponding rows.
